plays.text: Penalty to Rob Zamuner 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Mike Dunham
Penalty to Boris Mironov 2 minutes for Roughing P.J. Axelsson
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for High Sticking Marty McInnis
Penalty to Nick Boynton 10 minutes for Game Misconduct Ronald Petrovicky
Penalty to Nick Boynton 5 minutes for Kneeing Ronald Petrovicky served by Michal Grosek
Penalty to Boris Mironov 2 minutes for High Sticking Mike Knuble
Goal scored by Ronald Petrovicky assisted by Petr Nedved and Cory Cross
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Michal Grosek
Penalty to Ronald Petrovicky 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Mark Messier unassisted
Penalty to Martin Lapointe 2 minutes for Interference Darius Kasparaitis
Goal scored by Pavel Bure assisted by Brian Leetch and Eric Lindros
Goal scored by P.J. Axelsson assisted by Don Sweeney
Goal scored by Alexei Kovalev unassisted
